Strike - Weapons.name: Does Not Bow
Strike - Weapons.description: A Kell cut off his arms. He built himself new ones. Then he killed the Kell with them.

Strike - Weapons.name: Grasp of Malok
Strike - Weapons.description: "Dutiful Malok. Many offerings of Light did he make at the Shrines of Oryx." —Eris Morn

Strike - Weapons.name: Imago Loop
Strike - Weapons.description: …once-mighty wings, now dewy and fragile and new, as again the silken threads encased its...

Strike - Weapons.name: Treads Upon Stars
Strike - Weapons.description: Ghost has tried to translate this weapon's inscription, but the Cabal language has proven difficult to parse.

Strike - Weapons.name: Darkblade's Spite
Strike - Weapons.description: "In the Hive ways of old he challenged Oryx. He failed." —Eris Morn

Strike - Weapons.name: Baron's Ambition
Strike - Weapons.description: "To crack open that depraved Earth-Servitor. To use its secrets to reclaim the Great Machine..." —Translated from Fallen Language

Strike - Titan Armour.name: Darkblade Helm
Strike - Titan Armour.description: "Alak-Hul, the Darkblade, is laid low. And thus Vell Tarlowe is avenged." —Eris Morn

Strike - Titan Armour.name: Mau'ual's Maulers
Strike - Titan Armour.description: Valus Mau'ual once thought himself mighty. Valus Mau'ual doesn't think much of anything anymore.

Strike - Titan Armour.name: Mark of the Undying Mind
Strike - Titan Armour.description: The Black Garden grows in both directions.

Strike - Hunter Armour.name: Helm of Krolok
Strike - Hunter Armour.description: It's like they say: Pride goeth before the fall.

Strike - Hunter Armour.name: Arc Flayer Mantle
Strike - Hunter Armour.description: A mantle of woven Arc energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Kolar.

Strike - Hunter Armour.name: Cloak of Taniks
Strike - Hunter Armour.description: He of the endless troves of arms, and legs, and hearts, and lungs, and…

Strike - Hunter Armour.name: Solar Flayer Mantle
Strike - Hunter Armour.description: A mantle of woven Solar energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Vatch.

Strike - Hunter Armour.name: Void Flayer Mantle
Strike - Hunter Armour.description: A mantle of woven Void energy strings taken from the Psion Flayer Numoc.

Strike - Warlock Armour.name: Devouring Maw
Strike - Warlock Armour.description: Our enemies hunger for our knowledge.

Strike - Warlock Armour.name: Theosyion Vibrissae
Strike - Warlock Armour.description: Even in still air, Theosyion's tendrils continue to wave and twitch.

Strike - Warlock Armour.name: Omnigul Bond
Strike - Warlock Armour.description: "The Will of Crota is broken at last. May Sai Mota's restless Light at last find peace." —Eris Morn

Raid - Weapons.name: Anguish of Drystan
Raid - Weapons.description: "Hard to starboard! Stand by, weapons. Helm, get us out of here!" —Capt. Drystan Cor, First Fleet

Raid - Weapons.name: Doom of Chelchis
Raid - Weapons.description: "Where is the Great Machine? Where is the Great Machine?" —Chelchis, Kell of Stone

Raid - Weapons.name: Smite of Merain
Raid - Weapons.description: "No tomb but the battlefield! No legacy but the scars we etch upon our foes!"

Raid - Weapons.name: Zaouli's Bane
Raid - Weapons.description: "Go, child! Run! Don't look back! Don't—"

Raid - Weapons.name: Defiance of Yasmin
Raid - Weapons.description: "Shields up! Protect the Queen! Brace for impact! Save the Queen—" —Paladin Yasmin Eld

Raid - Weapons.name: Midha's Reckoning
Raid - Weapons.description: "I see now that everything dies. Even...even memory." —Midha, Consort of Stars

Raid - Weapons.name: Silence of A'arn
Raid - Weapons.description: "Without victory, we cannot go home!" —Primus A'arn

Raid - Weapons.name: Qullim's Terminus
Raid - Weapons.description: "If only...if only we had heeded the Queen..."

Raid - Weapons.name: Harrowed Anguish of Drystan
Raid - Weapons.description: "Hard to starboard! Stand by, weapons. Helm, get us out of here!" —Capt. Drystan Cor, First Fleet

Raid - Weapons.name: Harrowed Doom of Chelchis
Raid - Weapons.description: "Where is the Great Machine? Where is the Great Machine?" —Chelchis, Kell of Stone

Raid - Weapons.name: Harrowed Smite of Merain
Raid - Weapons.description: "No tomb but the battlefield! No legacy but the scars we etch upon our foes!"

Raid - Weapons.name: Harrowed Zaouli's Bane
Raid - Weapons.description: "Go, child! Run! Don't look back! Don't—"

Raid - Weapons.name: Harrowed Defiance of Yasmin
Raid - Weapons.description: "Shields up! Protect the Queen! Brace for impact! Save the Queen—" —Paladin Yasmin Eld

Raid - Weapons.name: Harrowed Midha's Reckoning
Raid - Weapons.description: "I see now that everything dies. Even...even memory." —Midha, Consort of Stars

Raid - Weapons.name: Harrowed Silence of A'arn
Raid - Weapons.description: "Without victory, we cannot go home!" —Primus A'arn

Raid - Weapons.name: Harrowed Qullim's Terminus
Raid - Weapons.description: "If only...if only we had heeded the Queen..."

Raid - Titan Armour.name: War Numen's Crown
Raid - Titan Armour.description: Show them you can contain multitudes, and your interiority will spawn nightmares.

Raid - Titan Armour.name: War Numen's Fist
Raid - Titan Armour.description: The start is always the same. Enter his court, and call him out.

Raid - Titan Armour.name: War Numen's Chest
Raid - Titan Armour.description: Death is the game, and the game is always death.

Raid - Titan Armour.name: War Numen's Boots
Raid - Titan Armour.description: Speak, and the Darkness obeys. Command, and the song turns upon itself.

Raid - Titan Armour.name: War Numen's Mark
Raid - Titan Armour.description: Will you barter your soul in exchange for the chance to kill a king?

Raid - Titan Armour.name: Harrowed War Numen's Crown
Raid - Titan Armour.description: Show them you can contain multitudes, and your interiority will spawn nightmares.

Raid - Titan Armour.name: Harrowed War Numen's Fist
Raid - Titan Armour.description: The start is always the same. Enter his court, and call him out.

Raid - Titan Armour.name: Harrowed War Numen's Chest
Raid - Titan Armour.description: Death is the game, and the game is always death.

Raid - Titan Armour.name: Harrowed War Numen's Boots
Raid - Titan Armour.description: Speak, and the Darkness obeys. Command, and the song turns upon itself.

Raid - Hunter Armour.name: Darkhollow Mask
Raid - Hunter Armour.description: "The Dreadnaught is a blighted hollow gouged into our Universe." —Eris Morn

Raid - Hunter Armour.name: Darkhollow Grasps
Raid - Hunter Armour.description: "All the vastness of our universe is but a blank page on which they scrawl their words of hate and death." —Eris Morn

Raid - Hunter Armour.name: Darkhollow Chiton
Raid - Hunter Armour.description: "Heartless and cruel is their realm—but in some ways more malleable than your own." —Eris Morn

Raid - Hunter Armour.name: Darkhollow Treads
Raid - Hunter Armour.description: "Even now, the Daughters of Oryx weave black words of blight to bind his realm to ours." —Eris Morn

Raid - Hunter Armour.name: Darkhollow Mantle
Raid - Hunter Armour.description: "To even exist in their space is to constantly demand your own existence." —Eris Morn

Raid - Hunter Armour.name: Harrowed Darkhollow Mask
Raid - Hunter Armour.description: "The Dreadnaught is a blighted hollow gouged into our universe." —Eris Morn

Raid - Hunter Armour.name: Harrowed Darkhollow Grasps
Raid - Hunter Armour.description: "All the vastness of our universe is but a blank page on which they scrawl their words of hate and death." —Eris Morn

Raid - Hunter Armour.name: Harrowed Darkhollow  Chiton
Raid - Hunter Armour.description: "Heartless and cruel is their realm—but in some ways more malleable than your own." —Eris Morn

Raid - Hunter Armour.name: Harrowed Darkhollow Treads
Raid - Hunter Armour.description: "Even now, the Daughters of Oryx weave black words of blight to bind his realm to ours." —Eris Morn

Raid - Warlock Armour.name: Mouth of Ur
Raid - Warlock Armour.description: For the more Light the worms consume, the hungrier they become.

Raid - Warlock Armour.name: Grasp of Eir
Raid - Warlock Armour.description: At the beginning, they stood in thrall of the Formless One, and they offered themselves to its depth.

Raid - Warlock Armour.name: Chasm of Yuul
Raid - Warlock Armour.description: A clew of writhing things there was also, on that cusp between Light and Darkness.

Raid - Warlock Armour.name: Path of Xol
Raid - Warlock Armour.description: Bound together, their power knows no limit, save their thirst for more.

Raid - Warlock Armour.name: Bond of the Wormlore
Raid - Warlock Armour.description: "They were two once. In the Darkness they joined. Such is the Hive's strength. And such is their hunger." —Eris Morn

Raid - Warlock Armour.name: Harrowed Mouth of Ur
Raid - Warlock Armour.description: For the more Light the worms consume, the hungrier they become.

Raid - Warlock Armour.name: Harrowed Grasp of Eir
Raid - Warlock Armour.description: At the beginning, they stood in thrall of the Formless One, and they offered themselves to its depth.

Raid - Warlock Armour.name: Harrowed Chasm of Yuul
Raid - Warlock Armour.description: A clew of writhing things there was also, on that cusp between Light and Darkness.

Raid - Warlock Armour.name: Harrowed Path of Xol
Raid - Warlock Armour.description: Bound together, their power knows no limit, save their thirst for more.

Raid - Other.name: Agonarch Karve
Raid - Other.description: "Life is pain. Pain is power. And power is life." —Toland, the Shattered

Exotic - Weapons.name: Ace of Spades
Exotic - Weapons.description: Don't play your hand unless you're sure you have that ace in the hole.

Exotic - Weapons.name: Bad Juju
Exotic - Weapons.description: "If you believe your weapon wants to end all existence, then so it will." —Toland, the Shattered

Exotic - Weapons.name: Fabian Strategy
Exotic - Weapons.description: Wait for enemy to make a mistake. Die. Stand by for Ghost Resurrection. Repeat as necessary.

Exotic - Weapons.name: Hawkmoon
Exotic - Weapons.description: Stalk thy prey and let loose thy talons upon the Darkness.

Exotic - Weapons.name: Monte Carlo
Exotic - Weapons.description: There will always be paths to tread and methods to try. Roll with it.

Exotic - Weapons.name: Red Death
Exotic - Weapons.description: Vanguard policy urges Guardians to destroy this weapon on sight.

Exotic - Weapons.name: SUROS Regime
Exotic - Weapons.description: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

Exotic - Weapons.name: The First Curse
Exotic - Weapons.description: "...is when death becomes an afterthought."

Exotic - Weapons.name: The Jade Rabbit
Exotic - Weapons.description: “What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?”

Exotic - Weapons.name: The Last Word
Exotic - Weapons.description: "Yours. Not mine." —Renegade Hunter Shin Malphur to Dredgen Yor

Exotic - Weapons.name: Tlaloc
Exotic - Weapons.description: Release the storm. Hold nothing back.

Exotic - Weapons.name: Touch of Malice
Exotic - Weapons.description: "Let them feel every lash, every curse, every touch of malice that they first dealt to me." —Eris Morn

Exotic - Weapons.name: Zhalo Supercell
Exotic - Weapons.description: An upcycled torrent of righteous thunder.

Exotic - Weapons.name: Hereafter
Exotic - Weapons.description: "Huddled at the mountain's base, we had no choice but to beat our ploughshares into swords once more."

Exotic - Weapons.name: Invective
Exotic - Weapons.description: "I tried to talk them down. They made a grab for my Ghost. After that it was a short conversation." —Ikora Rey

Exotic - Weapons.name: Telesto
Exotic - Weapons.description: Vestiges of the Queen's Harbingers yet linger among Saturn's moons.

Exotic - Weapons.name: The 4th Horseman
Exotic - Weapons.description: It's not a holdout weapon, it's a pathfinder.

Exotic - Weapons.name: The Chaperone
Exotic - Weapons.description: "My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there, before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday

Exotic - Weapons.name: Bolt-Caster
Exotic - Weapons.description: With your own hands you forged the mighty Bolt-Caster. Now take it in hand and unleash its thunder.

Exotic - Weapons.name: Dark-Drinker
Exotic - Weapons.description: With your own hands you forged the mighty Dark-Drinker. Now take it in hand and slake its thirst.

Exotic - Weapons.name: Raze-Lighter
Exotic - Weapons.description: With your own hands you forged the mighty Raze-Lighter. Now take it in hand and feed its flames.

Exotic - Weapons.name: Sleeper Simulant
Exotic - Weapons.description:
Subroutine IKELOS: Status=complete.
MIDNIGHT EXIGENT: Status=still in progress.

Exotic - Weapons.name: Thunderlord
Exotic - Weapons.description: "They rest quiet on fields afar…for this is no ending, but the eye."

Exotic - Weapons.name: Truth
Exotic - Weapons.description: “...is where you seek it.“ —Lomar

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: An Insurmountable Skullfort
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: BRAINVAULT Sigma-ACTIUM-IX Cranial Dreadnought (Invincible Type)

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Empyrean Bellicose
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: This barely understood Golden Age technology once held aloft the floating gardens of Pomona Mons. Now, it's stopping bullets.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Eternal Warrior
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: Absolute, unflinching resolve.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Helm of Inmost Light
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: "The light shines brightest in those it consumes."

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Helm of Saint-14
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: "He walked out into the demon light. But at the end he was brighter." —Paean to Saint-14

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: The Glasshouse
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: Everything is luminous.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: The Taikonaut
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: The helmets worn by the first Chinese lunar colonists of the Golden Age.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: ACD/0 Feedback Fence
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: The Active Contact Defense system uses Warsat hull materials to store a retaliatory charge.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Immolation Fists
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: "Don't let this sacrifice be in vain."

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: No Backup Plans
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: No ammo? No problem.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Ruin Wings
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: In the Garden grows a tree of silver wings. The leaves are ruin, the bark disaster. Of the seeds we do not speak.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Thagomizers
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: Don't get too close.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Crest of Alpha Lupi
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: Whoever survives our passing does so only by our consent.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: The Armamentarium
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: For This, There Is One Remedy

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Twilight Garrison
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: "One day the Last City will be known as the First City."

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Dunemarchers
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: Whether on solid rock or shifting sand dune, the inexorable Sand Eaters never slow their pace.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Mk. 44 Stand Asides
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: Pardon me. Coming through.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Peregrine Greaves
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: Victory from on high.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Mark of Oblivion
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: Our salvation lies ahead of us. Go forth. There is nothing left to leave behind.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Mark of the Circle
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: History's lords have ever painted the future in tones of fire and shadow.

Exotic - Titan Armour.name: Mark of the Executor
Exotic - Titan Armour.description: The New Monarchy is the aegis that guards humanity.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: ATS/8 ARACHNID
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: Advanced tactical sensorium. Induced hallucinations integrate broad-spectrum targeting data.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Achlyophage Symbiote
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: "They told me it would eat my thoughts and leave me full of Light."

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Celestial Nighthawk
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: Starlight is your guide. No vacuum will contain you.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Graviton Forfeit
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: "Doesn't matter how good you are—you stay out there too long, you're not coming back. Not the same way you left, anyway." —Tevis

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Knucklehead Radar
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: You can see the point, right? Who wants to team up with one?

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Mask of the Third Man
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: "It wasn't me. It was the Third Man."

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Skyburners Annex
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: "To die twice in a strange land: first by Oryx's hand, then by yours."

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Don't Touch Me
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: Amputated from a creature that stumbled out of a Vex gate. A vestigial defensive reflex still remains.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Khepri's Sting
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: The wound is not deep, but you know it exists—and that is enough.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Sealed Ahamkara Grasps
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: Plating the Ahamkara bones in silver helps to quiet the auditory hallucinations...oh bearer mine.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Shinobu's Vow
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: "No supplies. Armor in tatters. But the refugees had asked for help. And she had given her word." —Tale of the Six Coyotes

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Young Ahamkara's Spine
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: Give me your arm, oh bearer mine. Let me help you fill the world with teeth.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: ATS/8 Tarantella
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: Piezoweave induces controlled muscle spasms to improve combat performance.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Crest of Alpha Lupi
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: You've heard every last tale of the wolf by now. None of them are true. You are the wolf.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Lucky Raspberry
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description:
> No one has ever died wearing me. 
# It's true. She leaves the unworthy before they fall.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Bones of Eao
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: Defy extinction.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Fr0st-EE5
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: "Hey, if it works for computers…" —Marcus Ren

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Radiant Dance Machines
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: Built for swift movement, they provide unexpected and decisive social benefits.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Chaos Cloak
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: There is no doubt that our future will be won in battle.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Cloak of Oblivion
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: Our salvation lies ahead of us. Go forth. There is nothing left to leave behind.

Exotic - Hunter Armour.name: Cloak of the Rising
Exotic - Hunter Armour.description: The New Monarchy is the aegis that guards humanity.

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Apotheosis Veil
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: Most helmets protect the mind from the universe. Not this one.

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Astrocyte Verse
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: The ideocosm contained within this helm transforms the wearer's head from flesh and/or exoneurons to the pure, raw stuff of thought.

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Light Beyond Nemesis
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: These are the wings of pratiya-samutpada, the truth of interconnectedness. The everywhere Light.

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Obsidian Mind
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: Power from the ash.

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Skull of Dire Ahamkara
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: Reality is the finest flesh, oh bearer mine. And are you not…hungry?

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: THE STAG
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: Oh, deer goodness!

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: The Ram
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: ...PRAISE ME...

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Claws of Ahamkara
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: Look at all this life, oh bearer mine. There is so much left to burn...

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Nothing Manacles
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: The equations balance thus: you are diminished, and I am exalted. You are broken, and I am made strong.

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Ophidian Aspect
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: "Have I the aspic in my lips?"

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Sunbreakers
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: "When one can wield the fire of stars, what use is flesh and bone?"

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: The Impossible Machines
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: "The dead come for these, but the dead should not have them." —Crumpled note pinned in the clasp

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Alchemist's Raiment
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: To reshape the world piece by piece, thought by thought. All it takes is a little reshuffling of particles.

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Heart of the Praxic Fire
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: "In that last moment she seemed as wholly luminescent as the Sun, and I wished to be so brave."

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Purifier Robes
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: "Fire is the breaking of bonds. Fire is freedom. We must be swift and thorough in our liberation."

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Starfire Protocol
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: 13.4 billion years ago, the first stars kindled out of darkness, seeding the future of all life.

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Voidfang Vestments
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: "YOU WILL DREAM OF TEETH AND NOTHING ELSE" —scratched behind a buckle

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: Transversive Steps
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: In these boots, your relationship with consistent spacetime is...tenuous at best.

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: "Circle of War"
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: "Understanding is not an end, but a beginning from which new truths are born."

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: "Light Beyond"
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: "Every light that marks the abyss offers hope against the rising tide."

Exotic - Warlock Armour.name: "The Age to Come"
Exotic - Warlock Armour.description: "There is strength in unity. And a King of many, will be the King of all."

299200664.description: Banshee-44, the Gunsmith, sometimes sells this item in the Tower.

1662396737.name: Crota's Bane

1835600269.name: Old Russia

1963381593.name: New Monarchy
1963381593.description: Executor Hideo of the New Monarchy faction sometimes sells this item in the Tower.

2155337848.name: Special Orders
2155337848.description: This item is acquired from Tess Everis, the Special Orders merchant, in the Tower.

2644169369.name: Oryx's Dreadnaught
2644169369.description: This item drops on Oryx's Dreadnaught.

2770509343.name: Lord Saladin
2770509343.description: Lord Saladin, the Iron Banner Handler, sometimes sells this item in the Tower.

2859308742.name: Future War Cult
2859308742.description: Lakshmi-2 of the Future War Cult faction sometimes sells this item in the Tower.

2861499388.name: Meridian Bay
2861499388.description: This item can drop in Meridian Bay on Mars.

2975148657.name: Bounty Tracker
2975148657.description: Xander 99-40, the Tower's Bounty Tracker, sometimes stocks this item.

3080587303.name: Dead Orbit
3080587303.description: Arach Jalaal of the Dead Orbit faction sometimes sells this item in the Tower.

3107502809.name: Crota's End
3107502809.description: This item can drop during the Crota's End Raid.

3116705946.name: Heroic
3116705946.description: This item can drop as a Weekly Heroic Strike reward.

3286066462.name: Queen's Wrath
3286066462.description: Petra Venj, the Queen's Wrath, sometimes sells this item in the Tower.

3405266230.name: Patrol
3405266230.description: This item can drop from any patrol activity.

3413298620.name: Trials of Osiris
